sentences.en: Sociably, the new neighbors invited everyone on the block for coffee.
sentences.cn: 那个喜好交际的新邻居邀请街区的每个人去喝咖啡.

sentences.en: Two women in widow's black touch his arm sociably as he passes the street corner where they sit singing folk songs to each other.
sentences.cn: 两个身着素黑衣服的女人坐在街角互相唱着民谣，当他从身边走过时她们和蔼地轻拍他的手臂。

words.tran_cn: 社交的；好交际的；友善的
